problem_names: lemma repeat_stabilize_funpow: "repeat_stabilize n f v = (f^^n) v"
lemma repeat_stabilize_induct: "(P m) \<Longrightarrow> (\<And>m. P m \<Longrightarrow> P (f m)) \<Longrightarrow> P (repeat_stabilize n f m)"
translations: lemma repeat_stabilize_funpow: "repeat_stabilize n f v = (f^^n) v"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. repeat_stabilize n f v = (f ^^ n) v
proof(induction n arbitrary: v)

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>v. repeat_stabilize 0 f v = (f ^^ 0) v
 2. \<And>n v.
       (\<And>v. repeat_stabilize n f v = (f ^^ n) v) \<Longrightarrow>
       repeat_stabilize (Suc n) f v = (f ^^ Suc n) v
case (Suc n)

proof (state)
this:
  repeat_stabilize n f ?v = (f ^^ n) ?v

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>v. repeat_stabilize 0 f v = (f ^^ 0) v
 2. \<And>n v.
       (\<And>v. repeat_stabilize n f v = (f ^^ n) v) \<Longrightarrow>
       repeat_stabilize (Suc n) f v = (f ^^ Suc n) v
have "f v = v \<Longrightarrow> (f^^n) v = v"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. f v = v \<Longrightarrow> (f ^^ n) v = v
by(induction n) simp_all

proof (state)
this:
  f v = v \<Longrightarrow> (f ^^ n) v = v

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>v. repeat_stabilize 0 f v = (f ^^ 0) v
 2. \<And>n v.
       (\<And>v. repeat_stabilize n f v = (f ^^ n) v) \<Longrightarrow>
       repeat_stabilize (Suc n) f v = (f ^^ Suc n) v
with Suc

proof (chain)
picking this:
  repeat_stabilize n f ?v = (f ^^ n) ?v
  f v = v \<Longrightarrow> (f ^^ n) v = v
show ?case

proof (prove)
using this:
  repeat_stabilize n f ?v = (f ^^ n) ?v
  f v = v \<Longrightarrow> (f ^^ n) v = v

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. repeat_stabilize (Suc n) f v = (f ^^ Suc n) v
by(simp add: Let_def funpow_swap1)

proof (state)
this:
  repeat_stabilize (Suc n) f v = (f ^^ Suc n) v

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>v. repeat_stabilize 0 f v = (f ^^ 0) v
qed(simp)
lemma repeat_stabilize_induct: "(P m) \<Longrightarrow> (\<And>m. P m \<Longrightarrow> P (f m)) \<Longrightarrow> P (repeat_stabilize n f m)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>P m; \<And>m. P m \<Longrightarrow> P (f m)\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> P (repeat_stabilize n f m)
apply(simp add: repeat_stabilize_funpow)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>P m; \<And>m. P m \<Longrightarrow> P (f m)\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> P ((f ^^ n) m)
apply(induction n)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<lbrakk>P m; \<And>m. P m \<Longrightarrow> P (f m)\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> P ((f ^^ 0) m)
 2. \<And>n.
       \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk>P m;
                 \<And>m. P m \<Longrightarrow> P (f m)\<rbrakk>
                \<Longrightarrow> P ((f ^^ n) m);
        P m; \<And>m. P m \<Longrightarrow> P (f m)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P ((f ^^ Suc n) m)
by(simp)+
end
